body.p: The Oxygen Feedback search engine supports labels and label search functionality. This enables users to quickly find other topics with the same label in the WebHelp output. This topic describes the process of collecting labels and how to use this feature on your websites.

section.title: Labelling Topics
section.p:
To enable a label search, a topic must have a generated label that follows this structure:
Annual Plant
A label must have a span tag that stores the label's name. It also must have the a tag with an href set to the search page with a searchQuery parameter that follows this structure: label:label_name.
